instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3536 No Left Shift, Option, Contol
threads.message:
Changed U4850 with used chip from donor with clean J4813 area, pretty sure it's good by don't know how to tell.
Used 2x different new keyboards
Liquid Damage near J4813 both sides
Ran thru UC
Repaired pin4 of J4813 (PP3V42_G3H)

What seemed like a simple quick fix is driving me nuts. :|

threads.title: 820-3536 No Left Shift, Option, Contol
threads.message: Bad keyboard connector is most likely.
